item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. New speculative attacks on Apple CPUs (306 points | 99 comments)
2. Promising results from DeepSeek R1 for code (581 points | 363 comments)
3. Boom XB-1 First Supersonic Flight [video] (151 points | 138 comments)
4. Maxima in the browser using Embedded Common Lisp on WASM (128 points | 30 comments)
5. Ask HN: Are YC startups *actually* hiring? (72 points | 34 comments)
6. Using uv as your shebang line (124 points | 44 comments)
7. We're bringing Pebble back (2482 points | 638 comments)
8. Instagram deals reveal Meta is offering TikTok creators as much as $300k to post (39 points | 36 comments)
9. Bitwarden introduces mandatory 2FA for new devices (175 points | 180 comments)
10. Run DeepSeek R1 Dynamic 1.58-bit (622 points | 252 comments)
11. FTC Takes Action Against GoDaddy for Alleged Lax Data Security (172 points | 80 comments)
12. IAC confirms existence of a Super-earth in the habitable zone of a Sun-like Star (149 points | 133 comments)
13. Curo (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. Malimite – iOS and macOS Decompiler (16 points | discuss)
15. How has DeepSeek improved the Transformer architecture? (145 points | 34 comments)
16. Fixing my monitor's power button (54 points | 27 comments)
17. Watch the path of a raindrop from anywhere in the world (34 points | 14 comments)
18. Public Access OpenVMS System (56 points | 27 comments)
19. Keycloak, Angular, and the BFF Pattern (19 points | 5 comments)
20. Parkinsons patient "feels cured" with new adaptive deep brain stimulation device (5 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: Design/build of some elegant parametric speaker cabinets with OpenSCAD (38 points | 17 comments)
22. Janus Pro 1B running 100% locally in-browser on WebGPU (180 points | 17 comments)
23. Beautiful Free Math – Desmos Animated Graphing Calculator (117 points | 16 comments)
24. HawkEye: A Simple license header checker and formatter in Rust (26 points | 5 comments)
25. Turning the database inside-out (2015) (169 points | 78 comments)
26. LinkedIn LinkedIn Removes Accounts of AI 'Co-Workers' Looking for Jobs (11 points | 4 comments)
27. BrainFlood: Runtime code generation via reflection in .NET (65 points | 19 comments)
28. Hackers Crack Subaru's Connected Services to Access Data, Door Locks and More (69 points | 24 comments)
29. Qwen2.5-Max: Exploring the intelligence of large-scale MoE model (83 points | 19 comments)
30. The Illustrated DeepSeek-R1 (472 points | 107 comments)
